name: MLCArithmeticOperation
desc: Constants that describe an arithmetic operation.

items.name: case add
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise sum of the inputs.

items.name: case subtract
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise difference between the inputs.

items.name: case multiply
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise product of the inputs.

items.name: case multiplyNoNaN
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise product of the inputs, and returns 0 when the result isnâ€™t a number or infinity.

items.name: case divide
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise division of the inputs.

items.name: case divideNoNaN
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise division of the inputs, and returns 0 if the denominator is 0.

items.name: case min
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise minimum of the inputs.

items.name: case max
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise maximum the inputs.

items.name: case floor
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise floor of the inputs.

items.name: case round
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise rounding of the inputs.

items.name: case ceil
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise ceiling of the inputs.

items.name: case sin
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise sine of the input.

items.name: case cos
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise cosine of the input.

items.name: case tan
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise tangent of the input.

items.name: case asin
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise inverse sine of the input.

items.name: case acos
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise inverse cosine of the input.

items.name: case atan
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise inverse tangent of the input.

items.name: case sinh
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise hyperbolic sine of the input.

items.name: case cosh
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise hyperbolic cosine of the input.

items.name: case tanh
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise hyperbolic tangent of the input.

items.name: case asinh
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise inverse hyperbolic sine of the input.

items.name: case acosh
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise inverse hyperbolic cosine of the input.

items.name: case atanh
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise inverse hyperbolic tangent of the input.

items.name: case sqrt
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise square root of the input.

items.name: case rsqrt
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise reciprocal of the square root of the input.

items.name: case pow
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise first input raised to the power of the second input.

items.name: case exp
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise result of the exponent raised to the power of the input.

items.name: case exp2
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise result of the number 2 raised to the power of the input.

items.name: case log
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise natural logarithm of the input.

items.name: case log2
items.desc: Calculates the element-wise base 2 logarithm of the input.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual description of the arithmetic operation you use for debugging.
